article_title: Obamacare fight in SC busted by Senate rules
article_text: South Carolina’s main bill fighting the federal health care law died on a technicality Wednesday. Republican Lt. Gov. Glenn McConnell, the Senate president, struck down a Senate bill that tried to fix problems with a House version lawmakers believed would not survive a federal lawsuit.
